resources.string: Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

To use this app simply click the add new server button in the bottom right of the screen to add a new server.

Next fill in the details of your server. Please note that this app does require the open source program vnStat to be installed on your server, for the app to install this for you please log in as the root user, if you do not wish for the app to install vnStat for you, you can do it manually by following the instructions at:

http://marnistek.site88.net/install_vnstat.html.

Once you have added a server simply select the server and the data pages will load, this may take some time depending on your network connection.

To view or edit SSH known hosts select "Known Hosts" from the options menu.

To delete or edit a server simply hold down on the server you wish to edit or delete and choose from the pop up menu.

Any problems please email me at marnistek@gmail.com before leaving negative feedback.

Thanks

This app requires the program vnStat to be installed on your server, would you like to install this now?

WARNING

root access to server required
This app requires the program vnStat to be installed on your server, auto install of vnStat is not currently available for your server\'s OS, please manually install vnStat on your server.

For this app to work you need to install vnStat on your server, please either allow the app to install it (root access to server required) or visit:

 http://marnistek.site88.net/install_vnstat.html 

for instructions on how to manually install vnStat on your Server.
This app requires the program vnStat to be installed on your server, would you like to install this now?

For this app to work you need to install vnStat on your server, please either allow the app to install it or visit:

 http://marnistek.site88.net/install_vnstat.html 

for instructions on how to manually install vnStat on your Server.
If you enjoy this app, please take a moment to rate this app. It won\'t take more than a minute. Thank you for your support!
Maximum of 2 servers when using free version, please upgrade to the Pro version for unlimited servers.\n\nPRO VERSION COMING SOON!

Welcome to Linux Server Stats.

This app allows you to track and monitor the bandwidth / network traffic of your Linux server.

This app uses SSH to connect to your server and currently will only work with password authentication, so please set PasswordAuthentication to "yes" in sshd_config on your server. Connection via SSH keys will be coming with future updates.

This app also requires the open source program vnStat to be installed on you're server to monitor network traffic, the app can install this for you if you wish, provided you are running an OS (or variant of) listed in the drop down list on the add server page.

Thank you.
